com.viaoa.jfc.control
Class OAExceptionDialog

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          java.awt.Window
              java.awt.Dialog
                  javax.swing.JDialog
                      com.viaoa.jfc.control.OAExceptionDialog
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants
public class OAExceptionDialog
extends javax.swing.JDialog

Dialog box that works directly with OAExceptions to display dialog when an exception is created. Registers with OAException as a listener.

For more information about this package, see documentation.

See Also:
OAException, Serialized Form
